nodes.text: Oruba the Hutt created a criminal empire at some unknown date. It was ran by the Hutt lord up until his death in 20 BBY.
It was mentioned that Oruba used his quick wits and self-preservation to manage and making his criminal empire going.
Oruba's criminal empire was first mentioned in the 9th edition of the Star Wars: The Clone Wars Magazines, run by Titan Magazines.
